name: mist-ball
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the target. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the target. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk.
